body_html: I'm building an automatic parallelization module on TensorFlow.(https://github.com/snuspl/parallax). However, users must remember the number of partitions > 1 for NMT model. I want to provide an automatic way that users don't need to care about additional stuff for distributed environment. Even though I assigned the embedding parameters on a PS, it goes away to worker by the default placer. Is there any way that I can force to assign the parameters to a PS?
